TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SoapBodyBinding extends System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension

summary.span: 表示已加入至 或 的擴充性項目。

span.span: Represents an extensibility element added to an or an .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別指定抽象型別定義或實體的結構描述定義的訊息傳輸的 SOAP body 項目內的顯示方式。This class specifies how messages, either abstract type definitions or concrete schema definitions, appear within the SOAP body element of the transmission. 如需有關指定的 XML Web 服務通訊協定的詳細資訊，請參閱[ [ \]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01dfc27c-c68e-4910-a0aa-5e4c2a766b0c)。For more information about specifying protocols for XML Web services, see [[\]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01dfc27c-c68e-4910-a0aa-5e4c2a766b0c). 如需 Web 服務描述語言 (WSDL) 的詳細資訊，請參閱規格的http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/。For more information about Web Services Description Language (WSDL), see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/. ## Examples [!code-cpp[SoapOperationBinding#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapOperationBinding/CPP/soapoperationbinding.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[SoapOperationBinding#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapOperationBinding/CS/soapoperationbinding.cs#3)] [!code-vb[SoapOperationBinding#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapOperationBinding/VB/soapoperationbinding.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Encoding { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定包含空格分隔 URI 清單的字串。

span.span: Gets or sets a string containing a list of space-delimited URIs.

summary.span: URI 表示要用來在 SOAP Body 中編碼訊息的一種編碼樣式 (或多種樣式)。

span.span: The URIs represent the encoding style (or styles) to be used to encode messages within the SOAP body.

value.span: 包含 URI 清單的字串。

span.span: A string containing a list of URIs.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應該設定這個屬性的值，只有當值屬性是`Encoded`。The value of this property should be set only if the value of the property is `Encoded`. 否則會忽略這個屬性值。Otherwise this property value will be ignored. ## Examples [!code-cpp[SoapBindingStyle_Rpc#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapBindingStyle_Rpc/CPP/soapbindingstyle_rpc.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[SoapBindingStyle_Rpc#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapBindingStyle_Rpc/CS/soapbindingstyle_rpc.cs#3)] [!code-vb[SoapBindingStyle_Rpc#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapBindingStyle_Rpc/VB/soapbindingstyle_rpc.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Namespace { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 URI，表示未特別由 屬性所定義的內容之編碼方式的規格位置。

span.span: Get or sets the URI representing the location of the specifications for encoding of content not specifically defined by the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會傳回空字串 ("") 如果尚未設定屬性值。This property will return an empty string ("") if the property value has not been set. 如果此值只可設定的值屬性是`Encoded`。The value should only be set if the value of the property is `Encoded`. 否則屬性值都會被忽略，因此導致非預期的行為由 XML Web 服務。Otherwise the property value will be ignored, thus leading to unexpected behavior by the XML Web service. ## Examples [!code-cpp[SoapBindingStyle_Rpc#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapBindingStyle_Rpc/CPP/soapbindingstyle_rpc.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[SoapBindingStyle_Rpc#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapBindingStyle_Rpc/CS/soapbindingstyle_rpc.cs#4)] [!code-vb[SoapBindingStyle_Rpc#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapBindingStyle_Rpc/VB/soapbindingstyle_rpc.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property cli::array <System::String ^> ^ Parts { cli::array <System::String ^> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <System::String ^> ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出傳輸訊息的那些部分出現在傳輸的 SOAP Body 部分中。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating which parts of the transmitted message appear within the SOAP body portion of the transmission.

value.span: 字串陣列，包含適當訊息部分的名稱。

span.span: A string array containing the names of the appropriate message parts.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳輸訊息的某些部分可以出現在 SOAP 主體，例如 SOAP 搭配當之外的某些部分。Some parts of the transmitted message can appear in portions other than the SOAP body, such as when SOAP is used with a . 在此情況的其他成員屬性決定訊息的其他組件的位置。In such a case, the other members of the property determine the locations of the other parts of the message. 這個屬性會傳回完全相同的資訊屬性，但是結果會傳回陣列中，而不是以空格分隔的字串內。This property returns exactly the same information as the property, but the results are returned within an array rather than within a space-delimited string. ## Examples [!code-cpp[SoapBodyBinding_Parts#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapBodyBinding_Parts/CPP/soapbodybinding_parts.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SoapBodyBinding_Parts#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapBodyBinding_Parts/CS/soapbodybinding_parts.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SoapBodyBinding_Parts#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapBodyBinding_Parts/VB/soapbodybinding_parts.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ PartsString { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出傳輸訊息的那些部分出現在傳輸的 SOAP Body 部分中。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating which parts of the transmitted message appear within the SOAP body portion of the transmission.

value.span: 空格分隔的字串，包含適當的訊息部分。

span.span: A space-delimited string containing the appropriate message parts.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳輸訊息的某些部分可以出現在 SOAP 主體，例如 SOAP 搭配當之外的某些部分。Some parts of the transmitted message can appear in portions other than the SOAP body, such as when SOAP is used with a . 在此情況的其他成員屬性決定訊息的其他組件的位置。In such a case, the other members of the property determine the locations of other parts of the message. 這個屬性會傳回完全相同的資訊屬性，但是結果會傳回以空格分隔的字串內，而不是陣列中。This property returns exactly the same information as the property, but the results are returned within a space-delimited string rather than within an array. PartsString 用於內部以取得 xml 序列化，而且不應該直接呼叫。PartsString is used internally for xml serialization and shouldn't be called directly. 若要傳回傳送的訊息部分傳輸 SOAP 本文部分內出現，請使用屬性。To return the transmitted message parts appearing within the SOAP body portion of the transmission, use the property. ## Examples [!code-cpp[SoapFaultBinding_ctor#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapFaultBinding_ctor/CPP/soapfaultbinding_ctor.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SoapFaultBinding_ctor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapFaultBinding_ctor/CS/soapfaultbinding_ctor.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SoapFaultBinding_ctor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapFaultBinding_ctor/VB/soapfaultbinding_ctor.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::Services::Description::SoapBindingUse Use { System::Web::Services::Description::SoapBindingUse get(); void set(System::Web::Services::Description::SoapBindingUse value); };

summary.span: 指示訊息部分使用指定的編碼規則編碼，或定義訊息的具體結構描述 (Schema)。

span.span: Indicates whether the message parts are encoded using specified encoding rules, or define the concrete schema of the message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和屬性取決於這個屬性的值。The and properties depend on the value of this property. 只有當這個屬性的值，它們的值應該設定`Encoded`。Their values should be set only if the value of this property is `Encoded`. 否則 XML Web service 會產生非預期的行為。Otherwise the XML Web service will produce unexpected behavior. ## Examples SoapBinding_SoapOperationBinding#9SoapBinding_SoapOperationBinding#9
